bid.sentence: I () her goodnight -- 我想她道晚安
bid.translation: v：投标；出价；叫牌；恳求；致意 n：投标；出价；叫牌

manifest.sentence: The difficulty of the problem is () -- 这个问题的困难是显而易见的
